channel.title: Multiple quries into one visualization
channel.description:
Hi
I just spun up a redash instance to play around. Im tring to make a chart with data from multiple quries but still cannot seem how to make that work. The only way i have gotten it to work is using "union all" in mysq query and have all data in 1 query, but that does not seem like the best solution.
I hope this is possible :slight_smile:
Tonny

item.title: Multiple quries into one visualization
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Welcome to the forum! Can you share an example of what you mean? Indeed Redash uses one-query-per-visualisation. But this has not historically been a limitation. I’m not aware of any query tools that behave differently.

Read full topic
